STATE v. NELSON. No. COA05-1242. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed April 4, 2006. Certification Date April 24, 2006. Appeal from Buncombe (03CRS64517, 03CRS64520, 03CRS64521, 03CRS64522, 03CRS64523, 03CRS64524, 03CRS64525, 03CRS64526).

Case without published opinion. Remanded for resentencing.
